plot: Raphael, the international ladies man of epic proportions, opens the window on his zany adventures in this romantic comedy about his adolescence and upbringing. He is wrought with the question of who he is and sets off to unlock this door.
title: Raphael Dumtaro: Warrior of Love
plot_es: Raphael, the international ladies man of epic proportions, opens the window on his zany adventures in this romantic comedy about his adolescence and upbringing. He is wrought with the question of who he is and sets off to unlock this door.
plot_en: Raphael, the international ladies man of epic proportions, opens the window on his zany adventures in this romantic comedy about his adolescence and upbringing. He is wrought with the question of who he is and sets off to unlock this door.
